search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Teamwork Desk (teamwork-desk.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Teamwork Desk can be found at the following URL: [https://www.teamwork.com/pricing/](https://www.teamwork.com/pricing/)  .

extracted_content.content:
Pricing plans | Teamwork.com
===============         

[![Image 2: Teamwork.com](https://www.teamwork.com/images/logo/teamwork-logo.svg)![Image 3: Teamwork.com](https://www.teamwork.com/images/logo/teamwork-logo-white.svg)](https://www.teamwork.com/ "Teamwork.com Home")

 Why Teamwork.com

Built for businesses who do client work

[![Image 4](https://a.storyblok.com/f/99519/20x20/5f32204cc6/it-services.svg) IT services Streamline workflows and collaborate securely with your IT clients](https://www.teamwork.com/teams/it-services/)[![Image 5](https://a.storyblok.com/f/99519/20x20/7396b88877/agencies.svg) Agencies Project management and agency operations in one platform](https://www.teamwork.com/teams/agencies/)[![Image 6](https://a.storyblok.com/f/99519/20x20/e36c51b93e/consulting-services.svg) Consulting services Manage every aspect of your client relationships in one place](https://www.teamwork.com/teams/project-management-software-consultant/)[![Image 7](https://a.storyblok.com/f/99519/20x20/1dd11c6d52/architecture.svg) Architecture & Engineering Deliver complex client projects and maximize your team’s time](https://www.teamwork.com/teams/architecture-engineering/)

[Browse all industries](https://www.teamwork.com/teams/)

Solve your client operations challenges

[Browse all use cases](https://www.teamwork.com/teams/#use-cases)

 Product

Custom-built for client services businesses

### Frequently Asked Questions

*   #### What kind of teams get the most out of Teamwork.com?
    
    Teamwork.com is designed with client work in mind. That’s why teams that do client work — like marketing teams, agencies, consultancies, business development and professional services, product teams, software development teams and creative teams — tend to get the most out of it.
    
*   #### Will Teamwork.com work for my team?
    
    Look — we’d love to say yes. But, without knowing any more about your team, it’s hard to answer that question. Based on our collective experience, this is how we’d recommend answering this question. (It’s the process many of our customers use to research project management software.)
    
    1.  Look through the features list — does Teamwork.com have what you’re looking for?
        
    2.  Check the price point —does it fit with your budget?
        
    3.  Study third party reviews from [G2](https://www.g2.com/products/teamwork-teamwork/reviews), [Capterra](https://www.capterra.com/p/120390/Teamwork-Projects/reviews/) or your go to — like what you see?
        
    4.  Sign up for a free trial so you can test it yourself. (Or book a demo and fast-track your way through.)
        
    
    By the time you’re done, you’ll either have your answer or you’ll have a lot of questions for our support team!
    
*   #### I’m using something else right now — how easy is it to switch to Teamwork.com?
    
    As easy as we can make it. If you’re using Wrike, Asana, Basecamp, ClickUp, Trello, or Monday, you can import all projects with a click.
    
*   #### What happens during the 30-day trial?
    
    You get a chance to try Teamwork.com and see if it’s right for you.
    
    Our most successful customers upload a few real projects and fully test them out with their team — the ready-to-use templates make it really easy to get started. This gives everyone a chance to give you feedback on their experience and tends to improve adoption when it’s time to switch.
    
*   #### What happens if I sign up for one pricing plan but need to change later?
    
    You can upgrade (or downgrade) any time directly from the settings menu.
    
*   #### What payment methods do you accept?
    
    You can pay monthly subscriptions by credit card. We accept Visa, MasterCard, or Maestro. For annual subscriptions, we also accept payments by bank transfer. (You can also contact [support@teamwork.com](mailto:support@teamwork.com) if you need to use a different method.)
    
*   #### Will I get stuck in a contract?
    
    No. You can cancel any time with no cancellation fees.
    

### Choose Teamwork.com and get going today

Teamwork.com makes it easy to make work easy, with all the support you need to start delivering client work and streamline workflows from day one.
